channel.title: Final Creed Release 508!
channel.description:
http://uppit.com/v/PMD33ON4
Final Creed is a server based off Palidinio76 base and also Espeon, we decided to combine the too because they have features which are really nice, and will help us develop the server better, we decided not to use RS2HD because we did :)
Farhan Mystic Flow Pie
[B][U][COLOR="red"]Features:[/COLOR][/U][/B] i have no idea since mystic just sent me the source/base it may be blank or may have tons of features but i will be transfering a few things i have coded for my 508 espeon base which was Runecrafting, Duel Ring, started on theiving but havnt finished it, same goes for herblore, and prayer
[COLOR="Red"][B][U]I have seen the base/source now here are the features[/U][/B][/COLOR] - Clan Wars - Duel Arena - Trading - Shops (Need to fix) - God Wars (with npc aggression) - Kaliphate Queen - Jad - King Black Dragon - PVP, Multi & 1v1
[B][U][COLOR="Red"]Things Added[/COLOR][/U][/B] - Summoning with working pets :P - Runecrafting (100% My Way) - Teleporting with items (90%) - Thieving (50%) - Herblore (30%) - Prayer (30% need to add the rest of the bones) - My PyroWars Home Area - NPC Dialogue [COLOR="Orange"]NEW!![/COLOR] - Private Messaging [COLOR="Orange"]NEW!![/COLOR] - Split Chat [COLOR="Orange"]NEW!![/COLOR] (Credit to Rowan for converting to pali then me converting to espeon) - Server can be played in HD/LD [COLOR="Orange"]NEW!![/COLOR] - Custom Items (Thanks to Jonathen) + More thanks to Me. - Webclient + Forums [COLOR="Orange"]NEW!![/COLOR] (which loads models and spirits. thanks lol ftw lol for your tut's) - Pet Dragons ~ Ownage :) need the source so i can add the rest of the pets :P
[B][U][COLOR="Red"]Skills:[/COLOR] [/U][/B] Summoning: Herblore: Thieving: Prayer: Runecrafting:
[B][U][COLOR="Red"]Mini-Games:[/COLOR] [/U][/B] Duel Arena Gambler More to come.
[COLOR="Red"][B][U]Goals to achieve[/U][/B][/COLOR] - Training - Rest of the skills except for Constructions(have no knowledge on this >.<, and i think its useless) - removing the useless commands that are on this base - Webclient (LD/HD) - Clan Chat - Donater Island - More NPC Locations - More Boss Fights - Better NPC Drops (And more gonna list down after i think of some :))
[B][U][COLOR="red"]Pictures[/COLOR][/U][/B]
Home Location from my PyroWars Server :) [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/jf7xw8.jpg[/img]
Client [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/s1jbyw.png[/img]
Private Messaging [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2w2h75w.png[/img]
HD [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/4zylwk.png[/img]
[B][U][COLOR="Red"]Videos[/COLOR][/U][/B]
Ring of Dueling (instead of ::Tele commands for players) need to make it degrade after each use which should be fixed in few mins and need correct emote and gfx :) [URL=http://tinypic.com/m/4gg70x/2]Ring Of dueling (90%)[/URL]
Runecrafting My Way Not 100% it isnt even like runescape its just one single runecrafting :) [URL=http://tinypic.com/m/4gg9c6/2]RuneCrafting[/URL]
Stabilty [COLOR="Red"][B]200 Players NO LAGG!!!![/B][/COLOR] [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nGjJi_GKin8]Stabilty[/URL]
Prayer Not 100% yet because i got other bones to do :) also need gfx to complete my alter [URL=http://tinypic.com/m/4ggf46/2]Prayer (30%)[/URL]
NPC Dialogue [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/208jn5v/5]NPC Dialogue[/URL]
Summoning Pets with Pet Pickup thanks to Jonray for the video :) [URL=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2rrudd0&s=5]Pets[/URL]
[B][U][COLOR="Red"]Information about the server[/COLOR][/U][/B]
Me and Mystic flow decided that this server will be based on economy with tons of features it will however contain spawning but it will be only for the people that donate to the server, we will also have custom items but only the real one's e.g. Dragon Claws, Dragon Plate Body
this maybe the third 508 which will have all skills working because i love me skills (i did say "maybe")
ill update this thread constantly with new features.
Please Leave good comments and [COLOR="Red"]DO NOT SPAMM THE THREAD![/COLOR]
Thanks: Jonathan Pie

item.title: Final Creed Release 508!
item.dc:creator: @Pvp_508 Pvp 508
item.description:
@Pvp_508 wrote:

http://uppit.com/v/PMD33ON4

Final Creed is a server based off Palidinio76 base and also Espeon, we decided to combine the too because they have features which are really nice, and will help us develop the server better, we decided not to use RS2HD because we did

Farhan
Mystic Flow
Pie

[COLOR=“red”]Features:[/COLOR]
i have no idea since mystic just sent me the source/base it may be blank or may have tons of features but i will be transfering a few things i have coded for my 508 espeon base which was Runecrafting, Duel Ring, started on theiving but havnt finished it, same goes for herblore, and prayer

[COLOR=“Red”]I have seen the base/source now here are the features[/COLOR]

  • Clan Wars
  • Duel Arena
  • Trading
  • Shops (Need to fix)
  • God Wars (with npc aggression)
  • Kaliphate Queen
  • Jad
  • King Black Dragon
  • PVP, Multi & 1v1

[COLOR=“Red”]Things Added[/COLOR]

  • Summoning with working pets
  • Runecrafting (100% My Way)
  • Teleporting with items (90%)
  • Thieving (50%)
  • Herblore (30%)
  • Prayer (30% need to add the rest of the bones)
  • My PyroWars Home Area
  • NPC Dialogue [COLOR=“Orange”]NEW!![/COLOR]
  • Private Messaging [COLOR=“Orange”]NEW!![/COLOR]
  • Split Chat [COLOR=“Orange”]NEW!![/COLOR]
    (Credit to Rowan for converting to pali then me converting to espeon)
  • Server can be played in HD/LD [COLOR=“Orange”]NEW!![/COLOR]
  • Custom Items (Thanks to Jonathen) + More thanks to Me.
  • Webclient + Forums [COLOR=“Orange”]NEW!![/COLOR]
    (which loads models and spirits. thanks lol ftw lol for your tut’s)
  • Pet Dragons ~ Ownage
    need the source so i can add the rest of the pets

[COLOR=“Red”]Skills:[/COLOR]

Summoning:
Herblore:
Thieving:
Prayer:
Runecrafting:

[COLOR=“Red”]Mini-Games:[/COLOR]

Duel Arena
Gambler
More to come.

[COLOR=“Red”]Goals to achieve[/COLOR]

  • Training
  • Rest of the skills except for Constructions(have no knowledge on this >.<, and i think its useless)
  • removing the useless commands that are on this base
  • Webclient (LD/HD)
  • Clan Chat
  • Donater Island
  • More NPC Locations
  • More Boss Fights
  • Better NPC Drops
    (And more gonna list down after i think of some :))

[COLOR=“red”]Pictures[/COLOR]

Home Location from my PyroWars Server

need to make it degrade after each use which should be fixed in few mins
and need correct emote and gfx

Runecrafting My Way
Not 100% it isnt even like runescape its just one single runecrafting

Stabilty [COLOR=“Red”]200 Players NO LAGG!!![/COLOR]

Prayer
Not 100% yet because i got other bones to do also need gfx to complete my alter
Prayer (30%)

NPC Dialogue
NPC Dialogue

Summoning Pets with Pet Pickup thanks to Jonray for the video
Pets

[COLOR=“Red”]Information about the server[/COLOR]

Me and Mystic flow decided that this server will be based on economy with tons of features it will however contain spawning but it will be only for the people that donate to the server, we will also have custom items but only the real one’s e.g. Dragon Claws, Dragon Plate Body

this maybe the third 508 which will have all skills working because i love me skills
(i did say “maybe”)

ill update this thread constantly with new features.

Please Leave good comments and [COLOR=“Red”]DO NOT SPAMM THE THREAD![/COLOR]

Thanks:
Jonathan
Pie
